title: Recipe Fusion: Pan-Seared Salmon with Tomato Pop Couscous

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 1
preparationSteps.mainStep: Gather the first part of the cooking ingredients. They will be added in stages

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 2
preparationSteps.mainStep: Prepare and gather the ingredients for the second part. They will be added in stages

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 3
preparationSteps.mainStep: Prepare and gather the ingredients for the third part in a medium bowl. They will be added together
bullets: Cut 35 -40 cherry tomatoes in half - ~2 cups, ~10-12 ounces

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 4
preparationSteps.mainStep: Prepare the ingredients for the serving
bullets: Sliver 1 Tablespoon of basil - ~10 basil leaves

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 5
bullets: Pat dry the 4 salmon fillets and season with salt (~1 teaspoon) and freshly ground black pepper on both sides

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 1
cookingSteps.mainStep: SIDE - Heat a medium saucepan over medium-high heat
bullets: Toast couscous, stirring often, until it colors very lightly (2 minutes)
Add the 4 cups of water and 1 Tablespoon of salt
Boil water until couscous is al dente (10 minutes)
Drain the couscous through a strainer

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 2
cookingSteps.mainStep: MAIN - Heat a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat
bullets: Add and heat olive oil (1 minute)
Add salmon skin side up, and cook salmon undisturbed (4 minutes)

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 3
cookingSteps.mainStep: SIDE - Heat a heavy skillet over medium heat
bullets: Add and heat 2 Tablespoons of olive oil

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 4
cookingSteps.mainStep: SIDE - Turn the heat up of the heavy skillet to medium-high heat
bullets: Add the medium bowl of ingredients for the third part - cherry tomatoes, salt, sugar, and basil sprig

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 5
cookingSteps.mainStep: MAIN - When the 4 minute salmon timer is up, reduce heat to medium
bullets: Flip the salmon skin side down and cook salmon until done  (4 minutes)

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 6
cookingSteps.mainStep: SIDE - When the tomato 5 minute-timer is up, turn off the heat
bullets: Add the cooked couscous to the pan and stir together
Sprinkle the slivered basil on top

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 7
cookingSteps.mainStep: MAIN - When the second 4 minute salmon timer is up, turn off the heat

Spices & Herbs: to taste Freshly ground black pepper
Produce: 35 - 40 (- ~2 cups, ~10-12 ounces) Cherry tomatoes cut in half
